title: Sujud as sahu 4 mistake in dua in tashahhud (Sunnah Recommended acts Mistakes in Quran assimalhakeem
transcript: do we need to do forgetful frustration if we make any mistake in reciting any Dua during some Scholars say or the forgetfulness prostration can be done for any mistake you do even in Sunnah so even if you forgot to raise your hands y but this is not true the most authentic opinion is that forgetfulness frustration can be be offered if you make a mistake in Pillars or in mandatory acts Sun acts no you don't offer them mistakes in uh recitation of the Quran is as well not part of the things you make uh for and Allah Knows Best
